alert.note: Alert for Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:08PM EST until January 15 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida...Georgia... Santa Fe River At Three Rivers Estates affecting Columbia, Gilchrist and Suwannee Counties. St Mary`s River At Macclenny affecting Nassau, Baker and Charlton Counties. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. Monday evening at 915 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Mary`s River at Macclenny. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas and timber lands including some properties along St. Mary`s River Bluff Road and the Cypress Landing Resort on the Georgia side. At 14.0 feet, Flooding of bottomlands along the river and some lower access roads including the lower half of St. Mary`s River Bluff Road which cuts off 15 to 20 homes on the Georgia side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 10.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
